DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text which records the therapeutic agent or agents used in a treatment regimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._A directive to record the therapeutic agent or agents.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment schedule for the pre-clinical trial / therapeutic experiment describing the dosages of the drug and the times of the treatment.

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

Property.preferredDefinition: A directive to record the therapeutic agent or agents.

Concepts.definition: A directive to record the therapeutic agent or agents.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).
